title: Enhancing the electric charge output in LiNbO3-based piezoelectric pressure sensors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8313-8321
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07712H, Paper

Wenhao Xu, Wenping Geng, Huiyi Zhang, Wenxiao Fu, Zihan Wang, Jiahe Li, Xiaojun Qiao, Yichi Zhang, Xiujian Chou
LiNbO3 is used to prepare a piezoelectric pressure sensor and its sensitivity is significantly improved via heterogeneous integration.
